content: Let's practice! Press any button you like, and try out the moves!
Bam~! The challenge starts now. Get ready, and remember my moves!
Beats don't stop, spirit's on top! I'm your host, Aleo!
For this challenge, we're going with... bam~! {街市舞台歌曲}!
Beats bam~ non-stop! Challenge concluded. Join again anytime!
Pay VERY close attention! The beat of the music is key.
Third place goes to {PlayerName}, with {Score} points
Fourth place goes to {PlayerName}, with {Score} points
The MVP of this round is... {PlayerName}, scoring {Score} points!
Watch my moves, then repeat when it's your turn!
Second place goes to {PlayerName}, with {Score} points
Bam~! Time to reveal the results!
